title: __www_ansd_sn_intitutionnel_communiques_recrutement_tdr_developpeur_rgphae_pdf_txt
name: __www_ansd_sn_intitutionnel_communiques_recrutement_tdr_developpeur_rgphae_pdf_txt
notes: TERMES DE REFERENCE DES CONSULTANTS DEVELOPPEURS INFORMATIQUES POUR LE RECENSEMENT GENERAL DE LA POPULATION, DE LHABITAT, DE LAGRICULTURE ET DE LELEVAGE DU SENEGAL (RGPHAE)                                                                                           Dakar, Septembre 2011 I Contexte et justification  Dans la dynamique de modernisation de ses pratiques de collecte des données, lANSD envisage, pour la mise  en uvre  du prochain Recensement Général  de  la Population  et  de  lHabitat,  de  lAgriculture et  de  lElevage  (RGPHAE)  au  Sénégal,  dopérer  un  saut  technologique  en  ayant  recours  à  la  lecture automatique  de  documents  (LAD)  ou  à  la  dématérialisation  complète  de  ses  supports  de  collecte  par lutilisation dordinateurs de poche (Personal Digital Assistant, PDA)   Puisque la tendance du « tout numérique » permet de réduire les coûts de stockage des questionnaires, dacquisition des équipements, daccroitre la fiabilité des données, de réduire les délais de diffusion et, surtout,  de  limiter  les  erreurs  décriture,  lintérêt  de  lANSD  sest  ainsi  porté  sur  le  PDA  Cet  outil permet  de  recueillir  des  données  avec  des  règles  de  contrôle  prédéterminées,  par  là même,  limiter  les erreurs de collecte et de les transmettre dans les meilleurs délais au niveau central  Lordinateur  de  poche  permet  de  conduire  des  enquêtes  ou  recensement  et de  récolter  directement  les données  en  mode  connecté  ou  déconnecté  Lutilisation  de  cette  méthodologie  de  collecte  et  de traitement doit permettre à lANSD de se départir du support papier comme outil de collecte Un autre intérêt est lutilisation future de cette technologie lors de prochaines opérations similaires   Les changements attendus dans le déroulement de cette nouvelle méthode vont concerner :       l'activité de conception et de déroulement de linterview ; la non impression des questionnaires au format papier ; la prise en compte immédiate de la réponse de lenquêté en machine ; la disponibilité rapide des données collectées ; le traitement efficient des données  Aussi  lANSD  envisage  de  recruter  des  consultants  informaticiens  développeurs pour mettre  en  place tout  le  dispositif  informatique  de  collecte,  suivi,  traitement  et  diffusion  des  données  de  son  prochain RGPHAE prévu en Décembre 2012  II Rappel des principaux objectifs et résultats attendus  Il  est  envisagé  de  remplacer  le  format  papier  des  questionnaires  et  assurer  ainsi  une meilleure  qualité de la collecte et du traitement des résultats par lutilisation du PDA (Personal Digital Assistant) Une  application  est  directement  installée  sur  un  ordinateur  de  poche  Aucune  connexion  distante (Internet)  nest  nécessaire  Le  questionnaire  est  réalisé  en  mode  déconnecté  et  peut  donc  se  dérouler nimporte où On  distingue  plusieurs  phases  dans  le  RGPHAE :  cartographie,  RGPHAE  pilote,  dénombrement  et Enquête Post Censitaire Lutilisation des PDA  est  prévue  au  niveau  de  toutes  les  phases  sauf  pour  la cartographie Les  données  issues  de  la  phase  cartographique  seront  utilisées  comme  input  à  intégrer  dans  le  PDA avant le dénombrement   Lobjectif  principal est  de  raccourcir  le  temps  entre  la collecte  des données,  la production et  l'analyse des résultats à travers les objectifs spécifiques suivants :     optimiser lutilisation du personnel durant tout le processus de collecte et de traitement ;  réduire la durée du traitement par une bonne anticipation sur lappréciation de la cohérence et de la qualité des données ;

author: kaylenekpp4nv

resources.description:
历史 从19世纪中期有人将计时挂表装上皮带，戴在手腕上使用开始，逐步改进、缩小体形、美化样式，发展成为手表。 世界上的第一只手表是于1868年由百达翡丽制造给匈牙利的Koscowicz伯爵夫人的。但这种形式的钟表，在当时并不流行。 手表的普及化要推迟至二十世纪初。在1904年，经营珠宝的法国商人路易斯·弗朗索瓦·卡地亚接到飞行员好友亚伯托·桑托斯·杜蒙的投诉：当驾驶飞机时要把怀表从口袋里拿出来十分困难，希望他协助解决这个问题，以便在飞行途中也能看到时间。因此卡地亚便想出了用皮带及扣，将怀表绑在手上的方法，以解决好友的难题。而这种绑在手上的怀表，就是现今的手表。 1911年卡地亚正式将这种形式的钟表商业化，推出了著名的Santos手表。自此以后，手表便开始普及。 经历一个世纪的改进，1967年瑞士人首度将石英钟做成石英表，手表之后也由手动/自动上发条的形式，发展到用石英、电子等动力显示时间，并混合了较为简单的其他功能，例如计时、月相、量度脉搏等；现代手表增加了更多复杂的功能，如：电子手帐、MP3、手机等形式。而部份手表亦同时变成了手饰的一种，重点已不在显示时间，而在于其设计、品牌、材质（如贵金属及钻石）等特征上。 发展 1914年第一次世界大战爆发，各国军方意识到“免手提”腕表的重要性，这才启发了一般民众对手戴腕表的热切需求。1926年，发明了第一块自行上弦的腕表，从1960年起，传统的圆形表样普遍受到民众的喜欢。瑞士对腕表的进一步改进，就是把怀表所具有的计时、日历、陀飞轮及自动发条装置加以微型化，而装设于腕表上。1952年在美国、法国和瑞士各生产出一块电子表。1967年，纳沙泰尔的电子钟表中心开发出第一块石英手腕表，并在1970年以不同瑞士品牌的名字开始大量生产。自此，新的技术开始快速开发，不同品牌的手腕表也开始迅速发展。 分类 机械表 机械式振动系统的计时仪器，如摆钟、摆轮钟等。其工作原理是利用了一个周期恒定的，持续振动的振动系统。把振动时的振动周期乘以振动次数，就等于所经过的时间，时间=振动周期×振动次数。一般由能源、轮系、擒纵机构、振动系统、指针机构和附加机构等几部分组成。动力--发条或重锤，提供机械钟工作时的能源，通过齿轮系的增速使一次上条可连续运行多日，擒纵机构使钟表的计时频率符合人们“秒”的慨念，摆舵或摆轮控制着钟表的快慢，而报时（报刻）机构则告诉人们：刚才最后一响是几点了。 电子表 基本部分由电子元件构成。电子钟表的工作原理是根据“电生磁、磁生电”的物理现象设计而成。即由电能转换为磁能，再由磁能转换为机械能，带动时分针运转，达到计时目的。 晶体管摆轮表 就是以干电池为能源，用晶体管作为开关，摆轮游丝为振荡系统。 石英表 是用“石英晶体”作为振荡器，通过电子分频去控制马达运转，带动指针，走时精度很高。电子行针表。即是将电子机芯与石英机芯组合而成的，既有电子显示又有表针行走指示的手表。这类机芯如西铁城（Citizen Miyota Co.,Ltd）的T250机芯。 光波表 光动能电波表通过手表内置的电波接收器和天线，接收由发射塔发出的“标准时间”电波，获取时刻和日历等数据，自动校正手表的时间和日期。标准时间信号采用的是高精度铯原子手表的理论，十万年误差一秒。西铁城的电波手表全部采用光动能技术，利用任何可见光源作为能源驱动。只要有光就有能量，只要能接收到电波就永远不会有误差。 电子纸手表 电子纸手表是内部装配有电子纸显示屏的手表，其可以显示时间、星期、日期。 　目前实现电子纸技术途径主要包括胆固醇液晶显示技术、电泳显示技术（EPD）以及电润湿显示技术等。 而应用于电子纸手表的电子纸主要采用电泳显示技术。电子纸手表的显示亮度及对比度高，完全不需要采用背光方式来提高可读性。电子纸手表采用的电子纸显示，硬件结构简单，厚度可达1mm左右。是手表大军里的新生力军。 潜水表 所谓潜水表，顾名思义指的是经过防水处理、供潜水使用的手表。一般的防水表并不能用以潜水，潜水表一定要符合严格的规定，并非防水性够强就能叫做潜水表。潜水表标准防水性能至少达到200米水深的标准；表圈上有一可以单方向旋转的外环，用以测量潜水时间；潜水员往往身处灰暗的水中，因此潜水表的指针、刻度或表面通常须涂有荧光材料，才能让使用者读取时间更为简易。

resources.name: 腕表，就是手表，是指戴在手腕上、用以计时/显示时间的仪器.

resources.description:
bashar assad: show me the evidence : the two-way : npr
Lindsay Graham, R-S.C., right, accompanied by Sen. John McCain, R-Ariz., speaks Monday following a White House meeting with President Obama. Both senators are calling for a tough military response against Syria.
A defiant Syrian President Bashar Assad said Monday that the international community has not produced evidence to substantiate claims that his regime used chemical weapons in a deadly attack last month. "Those who make accusations must show evidence. We have challenged the United States and France to come up with a single piece of proof. (Presidents) Obama and Hollande have been incapable of doing so," Assad told the French newspaper Le Figaro in an interview in Damascus. Assad has made few public appearances and given few interviews since an uprising began more than two years ago. But with the U.S. and France favoring military action, the Syrian leader said such strikes could unleash much greater violence across the region. "The Middle East is barrel of powder and today the flames are creeping closer. It is not just a question of the Syrian response but what else might happen after the first (Western) air strike," Assad said. "Everyone will lose control of the situation when the powder barrel explodes."
United Nations inspectors left Syria on Saturday after collecting evidence on the Aug. 21 attack that left more than 1,400 people dead in the eastern suburbs of Damascus. The U.N. findings have not yet been made public. Secretary of State John Kerry said Sunday that tests showed sarin gas was used, though he did not say who conducted the tests. Obama, meanwhile, hosted two key Republican senators who have been pressing for a much tougher approach toward Assad. John McCain of Arizona and Lindsay Graham of South Carolina emerged from the White House meeting and said it was critical that the president make a strong case to Congress if he hopes to win congressional backing for military action against Syria. The senators support striking against Syria but said they want to see sustained U.S. efforts to degrade Assad's forces and upgrade the rebels. Asked if he supported U.S. efforts to arm the rebels, McCain said, "We should have done it two years ago." The senator said the U.S. should specifically target the Syrian air force, which has been used to pound rebels throughout the country. However, like Obama, the senators stressed that they opposed sending any U.S.����(简�^) troops into Syria. While McCain and Graham have been leading voices on Syria, they are considered to be among a small number in Congress who favor a relatively large-scale operation. Obama is expected to face opposition from a larger number of Republicans and Democrats who are either against military action or are skeptical about what it might achieve.Michael Kors Outlet

author: loup9w75stvd

resources.description:
Big 5 Sporting Goods (BGFV), one of the largest sporting goods retailers in the Western US, has seen a rebound in their business, which was hurt hard during the recession because of the regions the company serves, specifically California. Margins troughed for the company in the low 4% range, but have started to turn around, and should return back to the company's historic 6-8% range. This margin expansion creates a minimum 40% upside in the stock going forward. Margin expansion is further supported by a new store concept, favorable lease negotiations, and higher-end (higher-margin) products. BGFV will also enter the e-commerce area in 2014.The company has a "margin of safety" in the fact that even without margin expansion, the company trades at a deep discount to its competition on today's multiples, due in part to an over-blown, recent sell-off after the company's latest quarterly call. As we will talk about later in this article, BGFV's differentiated business model and regional focus also insulates the company from competition.Differentiated Store BaseOne thing that really interests me about BGFV is the location of the store base - the company focuses on the west coast. Here's a breakdown of the current store base by state:(click to enlarge)We see that over 50% of the store base is located in California. Because of this, the company was hurt pretty hard during the recession, but we have seen a strong rebound in CA, which provides more upside for BGFV going forward.Also, this west coast focus creates isolation against competition. Dick's Sporting Goods (DKS) has only 26 stores (5% of total store base) in California. Hibbett Sports (HIBB) has no presence (see below) in California, and Modell's is only located in the Northeast US. BGFV lists these companies as its major competition!Source: HIBB PresentationThe company has big upside from its presence in CA, and is isolated from competition because of the regions it focuses on.Differentiated store sizeAnother point of differentiation for BGFV is its store size. With an average size of 11,000 square feet, the stores are bigger than an average HIBB unit (5,000 square feet), but much smaller than the DKS concept (50,000 square feet). After following the sporting goods space for several years, my opinion is that this middle-size is perfect - big enough to be off-mall and carry more sporting equipment, but not as big as DKS (there has been some contention over the last year as to the viability of DKS growing to 900 stores if they plan of keeping the store size this big).New store concepts will be smaller, but still fit inside this mid-size concept.New Store ConceptsThe company has been testing a new, smaller store concept. The units have a lower upfront investment ($900K) and have average cash-on-cash returns of 24%. The New concepts also have higher margins (average operating margins of 12%) than the overall store base, which provides further support to the margin expansion story.E-Commerce LaunchSurprisingly, the company has no e-commerce platform as of today. Currently, you can only visit the BGFV website and find the closest store to purchase the item you are looking for.The company has been investing an e-commerce platform, which will launch in 2014. This should be another lever for growth for the company.Recent Sell-off - Q2 EarningsSo far we have a differentiated business model that faces only a small amount of competition from the other major sporting goods retailers. We also have a very interesting margin expansion story. Now, all we need is a good entry price. Lucky for us, we recently received this entry point after a sell-off due to the company's latest earnings call.The stock was sold off on the call for two major reasons, which I highlight below (along with my reason why the concerns were overblown):The company had been repurchasing shares, but stopped in the latest quarter. Also, when asked, theair max 87 company guided for flat share count for the rest of the year. (The company has been aggressively paying down debt, and I took the comment for the rest of the year as conservative, as many company tell analysts to model flat share count when they in fact plan on repurchasing shares)Guidance is for the smallest margin increase the company has had in some time (they are comping against the strongest 3rd quarter in the company's history as a public company)I was actually quite impressed by the quarter. Highlights of the call included:Promotional activity decreased in the quarter (this is really good news compared to most of the retail industry)There has been a strong start to Q3Slight improvements in customer traffic and a mid-single-digit increase in average ticketSame-store sales improved for each of the major product category (apparel, footwear and hardgoods)So now we have a strong business model and good entry point. Let's get into detail about the most compelling part of the story - margin expansion.Operating Margins - An Opportunity for Mean ReversionOver the past two years, the company's operating margins have fallen into mid 4% range. Over the longer-term, the company's margins have usually fallen in the 6-8% range. Management believes that margins will return to the historical range based on the following:New store concepts have 12% operating marginsSales leverage as the California/west coast rebound continuesIncreasing merchandise margins - there has been a focus to sell higher-end, higher margins products. This push to higher-end products also further insulates the company against competition from Wal-Mart (WMT) and Target (TGT) (BGFV's 10-K lists the big box retailers as competition)Favorable real estate costs - management noted that as leases have come up for renewal, they have been able to get more favorable terms (specifically in California).Company is closing underperforming storesE-commerce platform spend goes away next year - the company stated that investment in the e-commerce platform will equal $.05 to $.06 of lower EPS in 2013 because of the increased SG&AWhat's more, if you look at the trailing twelve months of performance, margins have returned to the low end (6.4%) of the range already (even though they are only in the 4.8% range for the last six months).OutlookThe company will do about $1B of revenue on average over the next two years (estimates are for just over $1B with a small range of $1.03-1.09B by seven analysts). Let's take a look at projections assuming no revenue growth and using the 6-8% operating margin range: LowHigh Revenue ($'000s)$1,000$1,000 Operating Profit$60$80 Net Income$1.57$2.10 Free Cash Flow$36MM$48MM FCF Yield9.5%12.7% EBITDA$82MM$102MM EV/EBITDA5.1x4.1xNote: Capex is at abnormally high levels in 2013 as the company invests in the e-commerce platform and distribution center. 2014 will see a reduction, which will increase free cash flow and allow for more dividends/share repurchases/debt paydowns.We can see as margins return to their normal levels, the stock becomes very cheap. Since the company will grow stores by 6% this year, the launch of the e-commerce platform in 2014, and the fact that there should be some upside in revenue as the west coast rebounds, these estimates could end up being conservative.A look at the competition's operating margins (DKS around 8% and HIBB around 12%) provides further support to management's 6-8% target.Balance SheetThe company has been aggressively using its free cash flow to��� pay down debt, from $77MM last year to $44MM today. This brings up a strong point - even though the company was at trough margins, it was still producing positive free cash flow.The company has also been using excess free cash to repurchase shares (the decline in purchases was part of the sell-off in the latest quarter). The company also has $6MM in cash and a revolver to fund operations.The company pays a dividend of $.10/quarter (2.4% yield). I expect this dividend to increase to about $.12/quarter next year.ValuationWe have seen what earnings could look like as margins return to normal levels, now let's take a look at the current valuation of BGFV compared to its competition: P/EEV/EBITDAEV/Sales DKS15.0x9.0x1.0x BGFV11.0x9.0x0.5x HIBB15.5x10.0x1.5xWe see that even though BGFV is currently operating below normal margins, the company trades at a deep discount to its competition on today's multiples. Is this justified? Maybe during the recession, considering the markets BGFV serves, but we have seen a rebound in BGFV's regions (specifically in California) and see a path to margin expansion and EBITDA growth. I would expect that the multiples expand in the near-term, closer to the competitions' multiples. Using an average of 0.75x sales and 14.0x earnings, we get a price target of $24 (about a 40% premium to the current price). I believe these multiples are fair because the company should trade at a discount to its competitors, considering the aggressive growth expansion of the other two names.If we use the high and low end of the future outlook range (see outlook section above), assuming minimal revenue growth and margin expansion to normal ranges, we get a price target range of $24-$30 (40-75% upside - note this valuation range is based on a blend valuation of free cash flow (8% yield), EV/EBITDA (8.0x), and EPS (14.0x)).RisksRisks for the company include:Inability to continue improvement in marginsSensitivity to California economyPoor weather can have a large impact on salesCatalystsCatalysts for the company include:Increased sell-side coverage - on the latest quarterly call, there were only three sell-side analysts (and two buy-side analysts) on the call. Increased coverage could increase demand for the stockFurther margin expansion to the 6-8% target rangeStore expansion - the company will open 15 new stores this yearStrong results at new store conceptsStrong results from remodelsIncreased sales from a continued west coast reboundIncreased sales from the company's entry into e-commerceConclusionAfter a recent, overblown sell-off, investors have been given the opportunity to buy BGFV at a steep discount to its competition. The margin-expansion story has already begun, and will be further supported by new store concepts, higher margin projects, and a rebound in California. The company is isolated from major competition by its focus on the west coast, and should see revenue growth as it launches an e-commerce platform. I believe there is a minimum 40% upside in the name from its current price, and am encouraging investors to buy the stock with an intermediate-term target of $24, and a longer-term target of $30.
Disclosure: I have no positions in any stocks mentioned, and no plans to initiate any positions within the next 72 hours. I wrote this article myself, and it expresses my own opinions. I am not receiving compensation for it (other than from Seeking Alpha). I have no business relationship with any company whose stock is mentioned in this article. (More...)
Big 5 Sporting Goods (BGFV), one of the largest sporting goods retailers in the Western US, has seen a rebound in their business, which was hurt hard during the recession because of the regions the company serves, specifically California. Margins troughed for the company in the low 4% range, but have started to turn around, and should return back to the company's historic 6-8% range. This margin expansion creates a minimum 40% upside in the stock going forward. Margin expansion is further supported by a new store concept, favorable lease negotiations, and higher-end (higher-margin) products. BGFV will also enter the e-commerce area in 2014.The company has a "margin of safety" in the fact that even without margin expansion, the company trades at a deep discount to its competition on today's multiples, due in part to an over-blown, recent sell-off after the company's latest quarterly call. As we will talk about later in this article, BGFV's differentiated business model and regional focus also insulates the company from competition.Differentiated Store BaseOne thing that really interests me about BGFV is the location of the store base - the company focuses on the west coast. Here's a breakdown of the current store base by state:(click to enlarge)We see that over 50% of the store base is located in California. Because of this, the company was hurt pretty hard during the recession, but we have seen a strong rebound in CA, which provides more upside for BGFV going forward.Also, this west coast focus creates isolation against competition. Dick's Sporting Goods (DKS) has only 26 stores (5% of total store base) in California. Hibbett Sports (HIBB) has no presence (see below) in California, and Modell's is only located in the Northeast US. BGFV lists these companies as its major competition!Source: HIBB PresentationThe company has big upside from its presence in CA, and is isolated from competition because of the regions it focuses on.Differentiated store sizeAnother point of differentiation for BGFV is its store size. With an average size of 11,000 square feet, the stores are bigger than an average HIBB unit (5,000 square feet), but much smaller than the DKS concept (50,000 square feet). After following the sporting goods space for several years, my opinion is that this middle-size is perfect - big enough to be off-mall and carry more sporting equipment, but not as big as DKS (there has been some contention over the last year as to the viability of DKS growing to 900 stores if they plan of keeping the store size this big).New store concepts will be smaller, but still fit inside this mid-size concept.New Store ConceptsThe company has been testing a new, smaller store concept. The units have a lower upfront investment ($900K) and have average cash-on-cash returns of 24%. The New concepts also have higher margins (average operating margins of 12%) than the overall store base, which provides further support to the margin expansion story.E-Commerce LaunchSurprisingly, the company has no e-commerce platform as of today. Currently, you can only visit the BGFV website and find the closest store to purchase the item you are looking for.The company has been investing an e-commerce platform, which will launch in 2014. This should be another lever for growth for the company.Recent Sell-off - Q2 EarningsSo far we have a differentiated business model that faces only a small amount of competition from the other major sporting goods retailers. We also have a very interesting margin expansion story. Now, all we need is a good entry price. Lucky for us, we recently received this entry point after a sell-off due to the company's latest earnings call.The stock was sold off on the call for two major reasons, which I highlight below (along with my reason why the concerns were overblown):The company had been repurchasing shares, but stopped in the latest quarter. Also, when asked, theair max 87 company guided for flat share count for the rest of the year. (The company has been aggressively paying down debt, and I took the comment for the rest of the year as conservative, as many company tell analysts to model flat share count when they in fact plan on repurchasing shares)Guidance is for the smallest margin increase the company has had in some time (they are comping against the strongest 3rd quarter in the company's history as a public company)I was actually quite impressed by the quarter. Highlights of the call included:Promotional activity decreased in the quarter (this is really good news compared to most of the retail industry)There has been a strong start to Q3Slight improvements in customer traffic and a mid-single-digit increase in average ticketSame-store sales improved for each of the major product category (apparel, footwear and hardgoods)So now we have a strong business model and good entry point. Let's get into detail about the most compelling part of the story - margin expansion.Operating Margins - An Opportunity for Mean ReversionOver the past two years, the company's operating margins have fallen into mid 4% range. Over the longer-term, the company's margins have usually fallen in the 6-8% range. Management believes that margins will return to the historical range based on the following:New store concepts have 12% operating marginsSales leverage as the California/west coast rebound continuesIncreasing merchandise margins - there has been a focus to sell higher-end, higher margins products. This push to higher-end products also further insulates the company against competition from Wal-Mart (WMT) and Target (TGT) (BGFV's 10-K lists the big box retailers as competition)Favorable real estate costs - management noted that as leases have come up for renewal, they have been able to get more favorable terms (specifically in California).Company is closing underperforming storesE-commerce platform spend goes away next year - the company stated that investment in the e-commerce platform will equal $.05 to $.06 of lower EPS in 2013 because of the increased SG&AWhat's more, if you look at the trailing twelve months of performance, margins have returned to the low end (6.4%) of the range already (even though they are only in the 4.8% range for the last six months).OutlookThe company will do about $1B of revenue on average over the next two years (estimates are for just over $1B with a small range of $1.03-1.09B by seven analysts). Let's take a look at projections assuming no revenue growth and using the 6-8% operating margin range: LowHigh Revenue ($'000s)$1,000$1,000 Operating Profit$60$80 Net Income$1.57$2.10 Free Cash Flow$36MM$48MM FCF Yield9.5%12.7% EBITDA$82MM$102MM EV/EBITDA5.1x4.1xNote: Capex is at abnormally high levels in 2013 as the company invests in the e-commerce platform and distribution center. 2014 will see a reduction, which will increase free cash flow and allow for more dividends/share repurchases/debt paydowns.We can see as margins return to their normal levels, the stock becomes very cheap. Since the company will grow stores by 6% this year, the launch of the e-commerce platform in 2014, and the fact that there should be some upside in revenue as the west coast rebounds, these estimates could end up being conservative.A look at the competition's operating margins (DKS around 8% and HIBB around 12%) provides further support to management's 6-8% target.Balance SheetThe company has been aggressively using its free cash flow to��� pay down debt, from $77MM last year to $44MM today. This brings up a strong point - even though the company was at trough margins, it was still producing positive free cash flow.The company has also been using excess free cash to repurchase shares (the decline in purchases was part of the sell-off in the latest quarter). The company also has $6MM in cash and a revolver to fund operations.The company pays a dividend of $.10/quarter (2.4% yield). I expect this dividend to increase to about $.12/quarter next year.ValuationWe have seen what earnings could look like as margins return to normal levels, now let's take a look at the current valuation of BGFV compared to its competition: P/EEV/EBITDAEV/Sales DKS15.0x9.0x1.0x BGFV11.0x9.0x0.5x HIBB15.5x10.0x1.5xWe see that even though BGFV is currently operating below normal margins, the company trades at a deep discount to its competition on today's multiples. Is this justified? I would expect that the multiples expand in the near-term, closer to the competitions' multiples. Using an average of 0.75x sales and 14.0x earnings, we get a price target of $24 (about a 40% premium to the current price). I believe these multiples are fair because the company should trade at a discount to its competitors, considering the aggressive growth expansion of the other two names.If we use the high and low end of the future outlook range (see outlook section above), assuming minimal revenue growth and margin expansion to normal ranges, we get a price target range of $24-$30 (40-75% upside - note this valuation range is based on a blend valuation of free cash flow (8% yield), EV/EBITDA (8.0x), and EPS (14.0x)).RisksRisks for the company include:Inability to continue improvement in marginsSensitivity to California economyPoor weather can have a large impact on salesCatalystsCatalysts for the company include:Increased sell-side coverage - on the latest quarterly call, there were only three sell-side analysts (and two buy-side analysts) on the call. Increased coverage could increase demand for the stockFurther margin expansion to the 6-8% target rangeStore expansion - the company will open 15 new stores this yearStrong results at new store conceptsStrong results from remodelsIncreased sales from a continued west coast reboundIncreased sales from the company's entry into e-commerceConclusionAfter a recent, overblown sell-off, investors have been given the opportunity to buy BGFV at a steep discount to its competition. The margin-expansion story has already begun, and will be further supported by new store concepts, higher margin projects, and a rebound in California. Since the company will grow stores by 6% this year, the launch of the e-commerce platform in 2014, and the fact that there should be some upside in revenue as the west coast rebounds, these estimates could end up being conservative.A look at the competition's operating margins (DKS around 8% and HIBB around 12%) provides further support to management's 6-8% target.Balance SheetThe company has been aggressively using its free cash flow to��� pay down debt, from $77MM last year to $44MM today. This brings up a strong point - even though the company was at trough margins, it was still producing positive free cash flow.The company has also been using excess free cash to repurchase shares (the decline in purchases was part of the sell-off in the latest quarter). The company also has $6MM in cash and a revolver to fund operations.The company pays a dividend of $.10/quarter (2.4% yield). I expect this dividend to increase to about $.12/quarter next year.ValuationWe have seen what earnings could look like as margins return to normal levels, now let's take a look at the current valuation of BGFV compared to its competition: P/EEV/EBITDAEV/Sales DKS15.0x9.0x1.0x BGFV11.0x9.0x0.5x HIBB15.5x10.0x1.5xWe see that even though BGFV is currently operating below normal margins, the company trades at a deep discount to its competition on today's multiples. Is this justified? Maybe during the recession, considering the markets BGFV serves, but we have seen a rebound in BGFV's regions (specifically in California) and see a path to margin expansion and EBITDA growth. I would expect that the multiples expand in the near-term, closer to the competitions' multiples. Using an average of 0.75x sales and 14.0x earnings, we get a price target of $24 (about a 40% premium to the current price). I believe these multiples are fair because the company should trade at a discount to its competitors, considering the aggressive growth expansion of the other two names.If we use the high and low end of the future outlook range (see outlook section above), assuming minimal revenue growth and margin expansion to normal ranges, we get a price target range of $24-$30 (40-75% upside - note this valuation range is based on a blend valuation of free cash flow (8% yield), EV/EBITDA (8.0x), and EPS (14.0x)).RisksRisks for the company include:Inability to continue improvement in marginsSensitivity to California economyPoor weather can have a large impact on salesCatalystsCatalysts for the company include:Increased sell-side coverage - on the latest quarterly call, there were only three sell-side analysts (and two buy-side analysts) on the call. Increased coverage could increase demand for the stockFurther margin expansion to the 6-8% target rangeStore expansion - the company will open 15 new stores this yearStrong results at new store conceptsStrong results from remodelsIncreased sales from a continued west coast reboundIncreased sales from the company's entry into e-commerceConclusionAfter a recent, overblown sell-off, investors have been given the opportunity to buy BGFV at a steep discount to its competition. The margin-expansion story has already begun, and will be further supported by new store concepts, higher margin projects, and a rebound in California. The company is isolated from major competition by its focus on the west coast, and should see revenue growth as it launches an e-commerce platform. I believe there is a minimum 40% upside in the name from its current price, and am encouraging investors to buy the stock with an intermediate-term target of $24, and a longer-term target of $30.
Disclosure: I have no positions in any stocks mentioned, and no plans to initiate any positions within the next 72 hours. I wrote this article myself, and it expresses my own opinions. I am not receiving compensation for it (other than from Seeking Alpha). I have no business relationship with any company whose stock is mentioned in this article. (More...)

groups.title: Linking Open Data
groups.name: lod
groups.description: A group for Linking Open Data datasets. The initial import of data for this group was done in October 2009 from the list of [RDF datasets dumps](http://esw.w3.org/DataSetRDFDumps) provided by the W3C Linking Open Data Interest Group.

groups.title: Linking Open Data Cloud
groups.name: lodcloud
groups.description:
This group catalogs data sets that are available on the Web as [Linked Data](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linked_Data)  and contain data links pointing at other Linked Data sets.

The descriptions of the data sets in this group are used to generate the [Linking Open Data Cloud diagram](http://lod-cloud.net) at regular intervals. The descriptions are also used generate the statistics provided in the [State of the LOD Cloud](http://lod-cloud.net/state/) document.

If you publish a linked data set yourself, please add it to CKAN so that it appears in the next version of the LOD cloud diagram. Please describe your data set according to [Guidelines for Collecting Metadata on Linked Datasets in CKAN](http://www.w3.org/wiki/TaskForces/CommunityProjects/LinkingOpenData/DataSets/CKANmetainformation). Please tag newly added data sets with lod. The editors of this group will review your description afterwards and move your dataset into the lodcloud group.
 
Please also use the [CKAN LOD Validator](http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/lodcloud/ckan/validator/validate.php) to check that the description of your data set is complete.

notes:

Copyright 2007-2012 UniProt Consortium. We have chosen to apply the Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivs License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/3.0/) to all copyrightable parts (http://sciencecommons.org/) of our databases. This means that you are free to copy, distribute, display and make commercial use of these databases, provided you give us credit. However, if you intend to distribute a modified version of one of our databases, you must ask us for permission first. All databases and documents in the UniProt FTP directory may be copied and redistributed freely, without advance permission, provided that this copyright statement is reproduced with each copy.

groups.title: Economics Datasets
groups.name: economics
groups.description: Group for Economics data especially that which is [open data](http://opendefinition.org/). This can be any kind of data related to economics from development to finance, and micro to macro. We run an open group policy so anyone can add datasets to this group but we will review datasets added to the group for quality.

groups.title: International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI)
groups.name: ifpri
groups.description: In collaboration with institutions throughout the world, IFPRI is often involved in the collection of primary data and the compilation and processing of secondary data. The resulting datasets provide a wealth of information at the local (household and community), national, and global levels. IFPRI freely distributes as many of these datasets as possible and encourages their use in research and policy analysis. This group reflects the collection of IFPRI datasets.

name: benin-small-farmer-survey-1998
notes:
This survey includes data from the Enquête des Petits Producteurs (Small Farmer Survey) carried out by IFPRI and LARES (Laboratoire d'Analyse Regionale et d'Expertise Sociale, Cotonou, Republic of Benin). The objectives were to describe rural livelihoods, examine how conditions for farmers have changed over time, and assess the impact of agricultural reforms on rural households. The training of enumerators, field testing of the survey and final revision of the questionnaire took place in June-July 1998. The survey itself was carried out over the period August to November 1998. The households were selected using a two-stage stratified random sample procedure based on the 1997 Pre-Census of Agriculture. In each of the six departments, villages randomly selected, with the number of villages proportional to the volume of agricultural production, subject to a minimum of 10 villages per department. In total, 100 villages were selected. In each village, nine households were randomly selected using listed prepared for the pre-Census. Three alternative households were selected for each village in case one or more of the nine were unavailable. In a few villages, the number of interviewed households was eight or ten, resulting in a final sample size of 899 farm households. 

Topics addressed in the survey include household and land characteristics, crop production, main agricultural activities, use of fertilizers and other inputs, source of credit, sale and use of crops, storage, consumption, time allocation, and sources of income as well as community level data on transport structure, marketing of agricultural products, village groups, agricultural production, extension services, and formal/informal credit. 

The survey was conducted in collaboration with Laboratoire d'Analyse Régionale et d'Expertise Sociale, Cotonou, Republic of Benin (LARES). Funding for the survey was provided by Bundesministerium für Wirtschaflitche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ).

title: The lymphatic system involving man.

notes:
What will be lymphatic filariasis?

Lymphatic filariasis can always be a parasitic disease caused by microscopic, thread-like worms. The Particular adult worms just reside in the human lymph system. Your lymph system maintains the body's fluid stability and fights infections.

Lymphatic filariasis affects more than 120 million folks within 73 countries throughout the tropics as well as sub-tropics associated with Asia, Africa, the particular Western Pacific, and also elements of the Caribbean and also South America. you cannot acquire infected with the worms in the United States.

How is lymphatic filariasis spread?

The disease spreads from individual for you to person through mosquito bites. Any time a mosquito bites any individual that has lymphatic filariasis, microscopic worms circulating within the person's blood get into and also infect the particular mosquito. people get lymphatic filariasis from the bite involving an infected mosquito. Your microscopic worms pass in the mosquito via the skin, and also journey to the lymph vessels. Inside the lymph vessels they develop into adults. An adult worm lives for about 5–7 years. Your adult worms mate and also release an incredible number of microscopic worms, referred to become able to as microfilariae, in to the blood. Individuals using the worms within their blood could provide the infection to other people by means of mosquitoes.

Who will be at a heightened risk with regard to infection?

Repeated mosquito bites more than several months for you to many years are needed to have lymphatic filariasis. Individuals living for any long time in tropical or sub-tropical areas the spot exactly where the disease is common are in your greatest danger for infection. Short-term tourists possess a really low risk. An infection will demonstrate up on the blood test.

What would end up being the signs and signs of lymphatic filariasis?

Most infected individuals are asymptomatic along with will not develop clinical symptoms, despite the undeniable fact that the actual parasite damages the actual lymph system. The small percentage regarding individuals will develop lymphedema. This really is caused by improper functioning in the lymph system in which results in fluid collection as well as swelling. This kind of mostly affects the particular legs, but tend to additionally occur inside the arms, breasts, as well as genitalia. most folks develop these clinical manifestations a extended time following being infected.

The swelling and furthermore the decreased perform of the lymph system ensure it is tough for the physique to fight germs and also infections. Affected individuals will have more bacterial infections inside the skin as well as lymph system. This kind of causes hardening and also thickening in the skin, which could be called elephantiasis. Several of these bacterial infections may be prevented together with proper skin hygiene.

Men could develop hydrocele or swelling of the scrotum due to infection using certainly one of the parasites that triggers LF, particularly W. bancrofti.

Filarial infection could additionally cause tropical pulmonary eosinophilia syndrome. This kind of syndrome is usually seen in infected individuals within Asia. Clinical manifestations of tropical pulmonary eosinophilia syndrome consist of cough, shortness of breath, along with wheezing. the eosinophilia is usually accompanied through higher ranges of IgE (Immunoglobulin E) as well as antifilarial antibodies.

How will be lymphatic filariasis diagnosed?

The regular technique for diagnosing active infection is the identification of microfilariae simply by microscopic examination. This specific is not always feasible because in nearly all elements of your world, microfilariae are nocturnally periodic, this means they only circulate inside the blood from night. for this reason, the particular blood collection provides being completed with night in order to coincide with all the physical appearance in the microfilariae.

Serologic techniques offer an alternative solution for you to microscopic detection regarding microfilariae for that diagnosis associated with lymphatic filariasis. Since lymphedema might develop many a lengthy time following infection, lab tests in many cases are negative using these patients.

How can I stop infection?

Avoiding mosquito bites is the best form of prevention. The Particular mosquitoes that carry the microscopic worms typically bite in between the amount associated with time involving dusk as well as dawn. If you reside throughout or perhaps journey to an area together with lymphatic filariasis:

• Sleep below a mosquito net.

• Wear extended sleeves as well as trousers.

• Use mosquito repellent upon exposed skin between dusk and also dawn.

What may be the therapy for lymphatic filariasis?

People have contracted adult worms may require a yearly dose of medicine, known as diethylcarbamazine (DEC), in which kills the microscopic worms circulating inside the blood. Although this drug will not kill all in the adult worms, it will avoid infected folks coming from giving the condition to a person else.

Lymphedema and elephantiasis aren't indications with regard to DEC treatment method since the vast majority of people with lymphedema aren't actively infected using the filarial parasite. Physicians could obtain DEC coming from CDC following lab outcomes confirm infection.

Even after the adult worms die, lymphedema can easily develop. An Individual could ask your own physician for any referral in order to visit a lymphedema therapist pertaining to specialized care. Stop the particular lymphedema from receiving more serious by simply next numerous basic principles:

• Carefully wash the particular swollen region together with water along with soap each and every day.

• Elevate and exercise the actual swollen arm or leg to go the fluid and improve the lymph flow.

• Disinfect just about any wounds. Use antibacterial as well as antifungal cream if necessary.

resources.description:
Fri Aug 30, 2013 10:17am EDT

air max 1
* H1 operating profit 584.1 mln eur
* Reiterates margin, sales growth targets
(Adds future CEO comments, share price)PARIS Aug 30 (Reuters) - Hermes plans to raise
prices next year, partly in response to the rising cost of silks
and leather, the French luxury group said on Friday as it posted
forecast-beating first-half profits.Hermes, the maker of 6,000 to 30,000-euro ($8,000-$40,000)
Birkin and Kelly bags, is hiking its prices after increases by
its rivals such as LVMH's Louis Vuitton and Kering's
Gucci earlier this year.Like its peers, Hermes said that as well as countering
rising material costs, the move was aimed at mitigating currency
fluctuations such as the weak yen compared with the euro.Japan accounts for almost a fifth of sales for Hermes, which
has the most biggest exposure to the country of any European
luxury goods maker, according to brokers such as UBS."You can indeed expect price increases, which as always we
want to be moderate," said Axel Dumas, who will take over from
Patrick Thomas as chief executive of the company when he retires
next year. Dumas did not give details.Shares in Hermes were almost 3 percent higher at 255.55
euros by 1219 GMT, the second-biggest gainer on the broader
French SBF120 index.Hermes posted a 14 percent rise in first-half operating
profit to 584.1 million euros ($772 million), thanks to strong
demand for its leather and silk accessories, giving the group a
margin of 33.1 percent.According to Thomson Reuters I/B/E/S, Hermes was expected to
post a profit of 570 million euros.Hermes also confirmed on Friday its 2013 recurring operating
margin could be close�]�g to the 2012 record of 32.1 percent.CALF LEATHERThe company said it achieved the increase in sales and
profits through higher volumes after it decided not to hike
prices at the start of this year."This is a very decent set of results, the guidance is quite
encouraging," a Paris-based trader said. "We should not
massively revise our numbers, but slightly tune up, to
completely reflect the guidance."Last month, Hermes reported a forecast-beating 16 percent
rise in second-quarter sales at constant exchange rates thanks
to strong demand for its leather and silk accessories, marking
an improvement from a 12.8 percent rise in the first quarter.At that time, it said it was getting closer to reaching last
year's record operating margin level, having previously
predicted a fall.It also forecast that full-year sales growth would slightly
exceed its mid-term growth target of 10 percent and recurring
operating income would increase slightly faster than revenue.Hermes reiterated the sales forecast on Friday, adding that
net cash stood at 596 million euros at the end of June.Last month, industry leader LVMH and Kering published strong
growth figures, but pointed to weakness in China.Hermes is faced with a dwindling supply of calf leather -
its No.1 raw material - because supply is driven by meat traders
who are responding to a drop in consumer demand for veal and
thus rearing and slaughtering fewer animals.Meanwhile, demand for luxury leather goods is still growing
and forcing the price of quality hides up 20-30 percent a
year.
($1 = 0.7562 euros)
(Reporting by Gilles Guillaume, James Regan and Astrid
Wendlandt; Additional reporting by Blaise Robinson; Editing by
Pravin Char)

MANILA, Philippines - British fashion label karen millen uk Karen Millen, known for its versatile investment pieces that provide attainable luxury and effortless glamour, is now in Manila.

Since 1981, this independent label has caught the hearts of many women for its designer style digs at the top end of high street fashion. Karen Millen builds the essential components of a modern woman’s wardrobe that can become cherished staples. The pieces have a timeless quality that transcends seasons.

The Cheap Karen Millen Dresses Uk Sale - Karen Millen Outlet Online Store design team is headed by Gemma Metheringham, who ensures the brand’s design credentials are met. Whether women are looking for perfectly tailored work wear, a distinctive little black dress or a classic leather jacket, Gemma and the rest of the team are dedicated to showcasing the brand’s effortlessly glamorous style.

This season, Karen Millen brings clean simplicity with emphasis on pieces that work well for the city girl. A mélange of graphic prints, tailored items, and a fresh color palette (from intense pop colors to karen millen dresses flattering soft nudes and pastels) are combined in this covetable collection.
Monochrome graphic prints are also standout pieces from the collection. Body con dresses get a bold update with block prints and subtle shine. Modest-cut garb also looks unique, especially the polka dot zip-front jacquard dress that looks utterly Cheap Karen Millen Dresses Uk Sale - karen millen sale Karen Millen Outlet Online Store whimsical. Other than monochromatic karen millen outlet prints, animal karen millen uk patterns also flourish in the new collection. Pieces like the paneled, cutaway dress combines black and white animal prints with houndstooth check and ikat, or the faux-croc chiffon blouse finished with bold black borders, collar, and cuffs look great at the office and at the club. Another “it” piece is the exaggerated leopard print cut into a boxy cocoon coat.

The biker jacket remains a key piece and echoes many of the season’s themes as it comes in different renditions: vibrant pop-colored washed leathers, feminine oriental chrysanthemum-print jacquard, and textural multi-colored tweeds.

Karen Millen’s key accessories echo the pared-down aesthetic that matches pieces from the collection, from clean, sexy heels to streamlined bags. The pointy toe court shoe rules the season and appears in monochrome combinations, while high-heeled variations of the gladiator sandal come in python and butter-soft leather. Clean, chic totes in cut suede, woven karen millen sale leather and mock ostrich can give your wardrobe a refreshing look.

Perfect for urbanites and city girls, Karen Millen will karen millen outlet surely solve your work-wear dilemmas and after-eight cocktail essentials with design-led luxury pieces on a global scale. Check out the latest karen millen dresses collection now at Karen Millen’s first store in Bonifacio High Street Central.

resources.description:
Thu Aug 29, 2013 9:10pm EDT


By Sara Webb and Elinor ComlayAMSTERDAM/MEXICO CITY Aug 29 (Reuters) - An independent
foundation tasked with protecting the interests of KPN
shareholders on Thursday moved to block Carlos Slim's proposed
7.2 billion-euro ($9.52-billion) offer for the Dutch telecoms
group, casting doubt over his expansion plans in Europe.Slim's America Movil already holds nearly
30 percent of KPN, but the surprise move by the KPN foundation
against his firm's offer underlines the difficulty the tycoon
faces in extending his telecoms empire outside of Latin America.Set up to protect key national infrastructure when the
former state monopoly was being privatized, the KPN foundation
said it had exercised an option to buy certain shares that will
give it almost 50 percent of KPN's voting stock."The foundation has intervened in this way in order to
safeguard the interests of KPN and its stakeholders, including
shareholders, employees, customers, trade unions and Dutch
society more generally," it said in a statement.The foundation argued that these interests were at risk
because America Movil had not consulted with KPN before
announcing its intention to make a takeover offer.A spokeswoman for America Movil declined to comment.Already the biggest player in Latin America, Slim is looking
for fresh investment opportunities to help turn around slowing
profits at America Movil, as well as regulatory efforts to cut
him down to size in Mexico, where he has long been dominant.America Movil, which acquired its large stake in KPN last
year, earlier this month said it intended to bid for the rest of
the company, offering 2.40 euros a share in cash.Slim, who began 2013 as the world's richest man, could also
try to fight the KPN foundation's move in court."We wouldn't be surprised to see AMX go to (the European
Union) to challenge the authority and legality of the foundation
on the back of this move," said Imari Love, analyst at
Morningstar. "It's clear the foundation is trying to keep KPN
Dutch-owned by using this poison pill, which, in effect, has the
same impact of golden shares, which are illegal."Jorge Negrete, head of telecom think tank Mediatelecom in
Mexico City, said Slim might well be feeling aggrieved."This isn't about business, this seems to me to be clearly
about protecting the European market," he said.FOUNDATIONSAmerica Movil also has theair max 1 option of sitting down to offer a
higher price for the rest of KPN it does not already own.The foundation itself called for more talks to be held."The foundation believes that America Movil should, in
accordance with the rules and what is common practice in the
Netherlands, open negotiations with KPN's Board of Management
and the Dutch government as soon as possible," it said.Still, KPN shares closed down 0.65 percent at 2.28 euros
suggesting that - at least before the foundation's announcement
- not all investors believe a higher offer would be justified.Foundations such as KPN's have been used to try and gain an
advantage in high-profile corporate battles, including luxury
goods maker LVMH's failed hostile takeover of Gucci in
1999 and hedge funds' efforts to replace the board and break up
chip equipment maker ASM International in 2008.Shares of America Movil, initially rose on the foundation's
announcement, reflecting the unpopularity of the KPN investment.
The purchase has so far resulted in billions of pesos in paper
losses for America Movil, Slim's flagship company.TELEFONICA FIGHTA number of analysts believe America Movil offered to buy
the rest of KPN to squeeze more money from Slim's great rival in
Latin America, Spanish company Telefonica, which is
seeking to acquire KPN's German unit, E-Plus.If so, the move paid off: earlier this week, Telefonica
raised its offer by 6 percent to 8.55 billion euros, and it won
America Movil's supportBlogger for the deal.The E-Plus sale will provide cash that will improve KPN's
balance sheet, and although it leaves the company without direct
exposure to Europe's biggest mobile market, it makes America
Movil's 2.40 euro a share offer less attractive, analysts said.In a research note written before the KPN foundation's
announcement, analysts at Sanford Bernstein said: "We think that
KPN could be worth as much as 3 euros per share."Raising the bid would be out of character for billionaire
Slim, who has accumulated a business empire stretching from
retail and financial services to infrastructure and oil and gas
drilling companies by snapping up undervalued firms.Shares of Slim's company ended down 0.16 percent at 12.81
pesos in trading in Mexico on Thursday. KPN's shares closed down
0.65 percent before the foundation's announcement."The fear now will be that Slim will now try to exit - any
sign that he will throw in the towel and sell down his stake
willair max 87 pas che femme hang over the KPN shares," said a person familiar with the
telecoms sector, speaking on condition of anonymity.To do that now would come at a hefty price for Slim, who is
still a good way�s�i�A�� from breaking even on his KPN investment.On average, Slim's telecoms giant paid about 3.24 euros a
share for its Dutch stake, including stock bought as part of a
rights issue by KPN earlier this year.

resources.description:
Google Sitemaps are XML files that list the URLs available on a site. The aim is to help site owners notify search engines about the URLs on a website that are available for indexing.
Webmasters can include information about each URL, such as when it was last updated and its importance in the context of the site.
A site map (or sitemap) is a list of pages of a web site accessible to crawlers or users. It can be either a document in any form used as a planning tool for web design, or a web page that lists the pages on a web site, typically organized in hierarchical fashion. This helps visitors and search engine bots find pages on the site.
While some developers argue that site index is a more appropriately used term to relay page function, web visitors are used to seeing each term and generally associate both as one and the same. However, a site index is often used to mean an A-Z index that provides access to particular content, while a site map provides a general top-down view of the overall site contents.
XML is a document structure and encoding standard used, amongst many other things, as the standard for WebCrawler to find and parse sitemaps. There is an example of an XML sitemap below (missing link to site). The instructions to the sitemap are given to the crawler bot by a Robots Text file, an example of this is also given below. Site maps can improve search engine optimization of a site by making sure that all the pages can be found. This is especially important if a site uses a dynamic access to content such as Adobe Flash or JavaScript menus that do not include HTML links.
Google Sitemaps Benefits:
1. Alert Google to Changes and Additions to your Website Anytime You Want
2. Your Website is crawled more efficiently and effectively
3. Web Pages are categorized and prioritized exactly How You Want
4. Speed up the process of New Website and New Web Page Discovery
5. No Waiting and guessing to see when Spiders crawl your web pages
6.�i���j�M Google Sitemaps is likely to set the standard for Webpage Submission and Update
Notification which will extend the benefits to other Search Engines
7. The Google Sitemaps service is Free.cheap soccer cleats

name: indice-harmonise-des-prix-la-consommation-ihpc-septembre-2010
notes: INDICE HARMONISE DES PRIX A LA CONSOMMATION   (IHPC) POUR LES PAYS MEMBRES DE LUEMOA (Base 100 en 2008) Dakar Septembre 2010    AVERTISSEMENT  LAgence Nationale de la Statistique et de la Démographie met à la disposition des utilisateurs lIndice Harmonisé des Prix à la  Consommation  (IHPC)  base  100  en  2008  Cet  indice  est  harmonisé  car  il  est  le  fruit  dune même méthodologie mise  en place dans huit pays membres de lUnion Economique et Monétaire Ouest Africaine (UEMOA) en 1996 et révisée en 2008 LIHPC  a  pour  population  de  référence  lensemble  des ménages  africains  de  lagglomération de Dakar Le  panier  considéré comprend 650 variétés suivies dans 1135 points dobservations Plus de 7000  relevés de prix sont effectués chaque mois La nouvelle période de base de  lIHPC est  lannée 2008 Les pondérations utilisées proviennent dune enquête  sur  les dépenses des ménages  réalisée  à  Dakar  en  2008  Dorénavant,  la  présente  publication  prend  la  relève  de  celle  de  lIHPC  base  100  en 1996  Lindice  harmonisé  des  prix  à  la  consommation  base  100  en  2008  a  enregistré  une hausse  de  0,9%  en  septembre  2010  Cette  évolution  sexplique  principalement  par  le renchérissement  des  « produits  alimentaires  et  boissons  non  alcoolisées »,  des « loisirs  et  culture »,  des  « articles  d'habillement  et  chaussures »  et  des  « boissons alcoolisées, tabacs et stupéfiants » En variation annuelle1, les prix à la consommation ont  progressé  de  3,0%  Le  rapport    des  prix  moyens  des  neuf  premiers  mois  de lannée  2010  sur  ceux  de  la  période  correspondante  de  lannée  2009  laisse  apparaître un relèvement de 0,6%  Les  prix  des  « produits  alimentaires,  boissons  non  alcoolisées »  se  sont  appréciés de  2,9%  Cette  évolution  est  liée  notamment  à  laccroissement  des  prix  des  « poissons frais  »  (+15,5%),  des  « légumes  frais  en  feuilles  »  (+9,3%)  et des  « légumes  frais  en fruits  ou  racine  »  (+3,5%),  du  fait  de  leur  rareté,  ainsi  quau  relèvement  de  ceux  des « pains  »  (+1,9%),  à  la  suite  de  la  hausse  des  prix  de  la  farine  de  blé  En  variation annuelle, les prix de la fonction ont crû de 8,9% Les  prix  des  « loisirs  et  culture »  ont  progressé  de  0,7%,  sous  leffet  de  laugmentation  de ceux  des  « forfaits  et  circuits  touristiques  composites »  (+2,8%)  En  variation  annuelle,  les prix de la fonction ont reculé de 0,5% Le  relèvement  des  prix  de  « confection  et  réparations  vêtements  hommes  »  (+2,8%)  et  de « confection et réparations vêtements  femmes » (+1,7%)  justifie celui des prix des « articles d'habillement  et  chaussures »  (+0,4%) Par  rapport  à  la  période  correspondante  en  2009, les prix de la fonction ont évolué de +0,3% Le  renchérissement  des  « boissons  alcoolisées,  tabacs  et  stupéfiants  »  (+0,3%)  est consécutif  à  celui  des  « tabacs  et  stupéfiants  »  (+0,3%)  Par  rapport  à  la  période correspondante en 2009, les prix de la fonction ont évolué de +4,4%                                                             1 Variation entre les mêmes mois de deux années consécutives © Agence Nationale de la Statistique et de la Démographie/DSECN /DSC/IHPC    Octobre 2010           1/7   Les  fonctions  « santé »  et  « biens  et  services  divers  »  ont  enregistré  chacune  une progression  de  0,2%  de  leurs  prix  en  septembre  2010,  en  liaison  respectivement  avec  celle des  prix  des  « services  hospitaliers  »  (+1,8%)  et  des  « produits  pour  soins  corporels  » (+0,6%)  En  variation  annuelle,  les  prix  des  services  de  « santé »  ont  crû  de  1,3%,  tandis que ceux des « biens et services divers » ont reculé de 3,5% Les  prix  des  services  de  « lenseignement  »  ont  enregistré  une  légère  hausse  de  0,1%  en septembre  2010,  imputable  à  celle  des  prix  de  « lenseignement  non  défini  par  niveau » (+0,5%) En variation annuelle, les prix de la fonction ont augmenté de 0,8% Les  prix  des  services  de  «  transports »  et  des  «  meubles,  articles  de  ménage  et entretien  courant  du  foyer »  sont  demeurés  stables  en  septembre  2010  En  variation annuelle,  les  prix  des    services  de  « transports »  ont  crû  de  2,4%,  tandis  que  ceux  des          « meubles, articles de ménage et entretien courant du foyer » se sont repliés de 1,0% Les  prix  des  services  de  «  logement,  eau,  électricité,  gaz  et  autres  combustibles  »  se sont  contractés  de  0,4%,  sous  leffet  dun  repli  de  ceux  du  « gaz  »  (2,9%) Par  rapport  à  la période correspondante en 2009, les prix de la fonction ont été majorés de 1,1% Le  repli  de  0,7%  des  prix  des  « restaurants,  cafés  et  établissements  similaires »  explique celui  des  prix  des  « restaurants  et  hôtels »  (0,7%)  En  variation  annuelle,  les  prix  des services de « restaurants et hôtels » ont crû de 1,2% La baisse des prix des services de « communication » (1,6%) est liée à celle des prix de la « communication  téléphonique  »  (1,5%)  Par  rapport  à  la  période  correspondante  en  2009, les prix de la fonction sont ressortis à 6,1% Au  cours  du  mois  sous  revue,  linflation  sous  jacente2  est  demeurée  stable  en  rythme mensuel  et  sest  accrue  de  0,1%  en  variation  annuelle  Les  prix  des  produits  locaux  ont  crû de 1,3%,  tandis que ceux des produits  importés se sont  repliés de 0,2% Comparés au mois de septembre 2009,  les prix des produits  locaux et  importés ont été majorés  respectivement de 3,6% et 1,5%                                                             2 Classification permettant de suivre le niveau de linflation qui serait obtenu en dehors des phénomènes perturbateurs que sont les produits saisonniers et les produits énergétiques  © Agence Nationale de la Statistique et de la Démographie/DSECN /DSC/IHPC    Octobre  2010           2/7

groups.description: The Land Data group is a collaborative platform to collect sources of information about land-related issues for the Land Portal (http://landportal.info). We invite you to help us improve this collection of databases!

name: land-matrix
notes:
The Land Matrix dataset is a public database of large-scale land deals. It provides records documenting land deals since 2000.

As of April 2012 the data available represents about 50% of the entire data base. The remaining deals are being crosschecked and added, together with new data provided, on an on-going basis.

### Openness and Licensing

The [Disclaimer and License page](http://landportal.info/landmatrix/index.php#pages-disclaimer) links to [terms and conditions](http://landportal.info/page/terms-and-conditions-use). The only specific reference to a license therein (which seems to be for entire website and not just database) is within No contract section where it states:

> ... Furthermore, the coordinators of the Land Portal may add, change, improve, or update the information of the website without notice and may in its sole discretion alter, limit or discontinue part of this site or deny at its sole discretion any user access to this site or any portion thereof.
> 
> For more information, see Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

This license is, of course, not open as per the http://OpenDefinition.org/ due to its non-commercial restriction.

name: indice-national-des-prix-la-consommation-inpc-juillet-2010
notes: INDICE NATIONAL DES PRIX À LA CONSOMMATION  (INPC) (Base 100 en 2008) DAKAR  Juillet 2010   LAgence Nationale de  la  Statistique  et de  la Démographie  (ANSD) publie depuis  janvier 2010,  la note mensuelle  de  lIndice  National  des  Prix  à  la  Consommation  (INPC)  Cet  indice  base  100  en  2008, mesure  lévolution  des  prix  au  plan  national  Les  indices  sont  de  type  Laspeyres  et  les  pondérations sont  issues des dépenses de consommation des ménages  tirées de  lEnquête de Suivi de  la Pauvreté au  Sénégal  de  2005  (ESPS)  Le  champ  couvert  par  lindice  national  des  prix  à  la  consommation  est lensemble  du  pays  découpé  en  zones  écologiques/économiques,  à  savoir  le  Sud,  le  Nord,  le  Centre Nord,  lOuest  et  le  Centre  Sud  Ces  cinq  zones  sont  représentées  respectivement  par  Kolda,  Saint Louis, Diourbel, Dakar et Kaolack La collecte des prix se fait dans les capitales de ces régions LINPC est  publié  selon  la  classification  des  fonctions  de  consommation  des  ménages  à  12  fonctions (COICOP1)  Au  total,  la  méthodologie  est  conforme  à  celle  appliquée  pour  le  calcul  du  nouvel  Indice Harmonisé  des  Prix  à  la  Consommation  (IHPC  base  100  en  2008)  dont  la  couverture  est  limitée  à lagglomération de Dakar  LIndice National des Prix à la Consommation du mois de juillet 2010 a enregistré une hausse de  1,8%,  par  rapport  au  mois  précédent  Cette  évolution  sexplique  principalement  par  le renchérissement  des  « produits  alimentaires  et  boissons  non  alcoolisées »,  des  « biens  et services divers », des « restaurants et hôtels » et des services de « transports »   Les  prix  des « produits  alimentaires,  boissons  non  alcoolisées »  ont  progressé  de  3,3%  en variation  mensuelle,  sous  leffet  du  relèvement  de  ceux  des  « légumes  frais  en  fruits  ou  racine  » (+20,2%),  des  « poissons  frais »  (+11,6%),  des  « légumes  secs  et  oléagineux  »  (+9,2%),  des « légumes  frais  en  feuilles »  (+8,1%),  des  « sels,  épices,  sauces  et  produits  alimentaires  non déclarés ailleurs » (+5,7%), des « autres fruits frais » (+4,3%), des « pains » (+3,4%) et de la viande  de « buf » (+2,6%) La chute de la production maraichère et la rareté des ressources halieutiques, à  la  suite  de  linstallation  de  lhivernage,  sont  à  lorigine  de  lévolution  observée  au  niveau  des légumes  et  des  poissons  Toutefois,  le  repli  des  prix  des  « pâtes  alimentaires  »  (2,8%),  des « farines, semoules et gruaux » (2,5%) et des « huiles » (1,4%) a atténué cette tendance Les  prix  des  «  biens  et  services  divers »  ont  progressé  de  1,5%,  en  liaison  avec  laccroissement de ceux des « articles de bijouterie et d'horlogerie » (+4,2%)  La  hausse  des  prix  des  « restaurants,  cafés  et  établissements  similaires »  (+0,7%)  explique essentiellement celle des prix des « restaurants et hôtels » (+0,6%) Les  services  de « transports »  se  sont appréciés de 0,4% en  variation mensuelle, sous  leffet dun renchérissement  du  « transport  routier  de  passagers »  (+0,9%)  et  du  « transport  aérien  de passagers » (+0,4%) Lappréciation  des  prix  des  services  de  « santé »  (+0,2%)  est  consécutive  à  celle  des  prix  des « médicaments traditionnels » (+4,6%) et des « appareils et matériels thérapeutiques » (+5,7%)                                                              1  Nomenclature  de  classification  (Classification  of  individual  consomption  by  purpose),  qui  est  structurée  de  façon emboîtée en fonctions, groupes, sousgroupes et postes © ANSD/DSECN /DSC/INPC Septembre 2010                                                                                                                 1/4           Les  prix  des  fonctions  « logement,  eau,  électricité,  gaz  et  autres  combustibles  »,  «  meubles, articles de ménage et  entretien  courant du  foyer »  et  « enseignement »  sont demeurés  stables au cours de la période sous revue Les  fonctions  « articles  dhabillement  et  chaussures  »  et  « boissons  alcoolisées,  tabacs  et stupéfiants » ont connu chacune un fléchissement de 0,2% de leurs prix au cours du mois de juillet 2010  Le  repli  des  prix  des  « vêtements  enfants  et  nourrissons  »  (1,4%),  des  « vêtements  de dessus femmes » (1,2%) et des « chaussures enfants » (0,7%) est à lorigine de celui des prix des « articles  dhabillement  et  chaussures  »  La  baisse  des  prix  des  « boissons  alcoolisées,  tabacs  et stupéfiants » est due à celle des prix du « tabac et stupéfiants » (0,2%) Le  repli  des  prix  du  « matériel  de  traitement  de  l'information  et  supports  d'enregistrement »  (1,3%) et  des  « appareils  de  réception,  enregistrement  et  reproduction »  (0,9%)  justifie  celui  des  prix  des « loisirs et culture » (0,3%) La  baisse  des  prix  des  services  de  « communication »  (2,3%)  est  liée  à  celle  des  prix  de  la « communication téléphonique » (3,1%) Au cours du mois sous revue, linflation sous jacente2 sest inscrite en hausse de 0,6% Les prix des produits locaux et importés ont progressé respectivement de 1,7% et 1,8% au mois de juillet 2010  variation de l'INPC au mois de juillet 2010Indice  global12    BIENS  ET  SERVICES name: indice-harmonise-des-prix-la-consommation-ihpc-octobre-2010
notes: INDICE HARMONISE DES PRIX A LA CONSOMMATION   (IHPC) POUR LES PAYS MEMBRES DE LUEMOA (Base 100 en 2008) Dakar Octobre 2010    AVERTISSEMENT  LAgence Nationale de la Statistique et de la Démographie met à la disposition des utilisateurs lIndice Harmonisé des Prix à la  Consommation  (IHPC)  base  100  en  2008  Cet  indice  est  harmonisé  car  il  est  le  fruit  dune même méthodologie mise  en place dans huit pays membres de lUnion Economique et Monétaire Ouest Africaine (UEMOA) en 1996 et révisée en 2008 LIHPC  a  pour  population  de  référence  lensemble  des ménages  africains  de  lagglomération de Dakar Le  panier  considéré comprend 650 variétés suivies dans 1135 points dobservations Plus de 7000  relevés de prix sont effectués chaque mois La nouvelle période de base de  lIHPC est  lannée 2008 Les pondérations utilisées proviennent dune enquête  sur  les dépenses des ménages  réalisée  à  Dakar  en  2008  Dorénavant,  la  présente  publication  prend  la  relève  de  celle  de  lIHPC  base  100  en 1996   Lindice  harmonisé  des  prix  à  la  consommation  base  100  en  2008  a  enregistré  une hausse  de  0,5%  en  octobre  2010  Cette  évolution  sexplique  principalement  par  la croissance  des  prix  des  services  de  « lenseignement »,  des  services  de « communication »,  des  « produits  alimentaires  et  boissons  non  alcoolisées »  et  des « loisirs et culture » En variation annuelle1,  les prix à  la consommation ont progressé de 2,3% Le  rapport   des prix moyens des dix premiers mois de  lannée 2010 sur ceux de la période correspondante de lannée 2009 laisse apparaître un relèvement de 0,8%  La rentrée scolaire 2010/2011 a eu des répercussions sur la fonction « enseignement » Ainsi,  les  prix  de  cette  fonction  ont  augmenté  de  2,6%  en  rythme  mensuel,  en  liaison avec lenseignement  secondaire  (+5,3%),  de lenseignement  préélémentaire  et  primaire  (+3,1%)  En  variation  annuelle,  les  prix  de cette fonction ont crû de 1,8% Le  relèvement  des  prix  des  services de « communication »  (+1,4%) est  lié à  celui des prix de  la  « communication  téléphonique  »  (+2,1%)  Par  rapport  à  la  période  correspondante  en 2009, les prix de la fonction sont ressortis à 2,4% Les  prix  des  « produits  alimentaires,  boissons  non  alcoolisées »  se  sont  appréciés de  0,9%  Cette  évolution  est  liée  notamment  à  laccroissement  des  prix  des  « légumes frais  en  feuilles  »  (+54,0%),  du  fait  de  leur  rareté,  ainsi  quau  relèvement  de  ceux  des « pains  »  (+13,2%),  à  la  suite  de  la  hausse  des  prix  de  la  farine  de  blé  En  variation annuelle, les prix de la fonction ont crû de 6,2% Les  prix  des  services  de  «  logement,  eau,  électricité,  gaz  et  autres  combustibles  »  ont augmenté  de  0,2%,  sous  leffet  dun  renchérissement  des  « combustibles  solides  »  (+3,2%) et  des  « services  liés  au  logement »  (+1,5%)  Par  rapport  à  la  période  correspondante  en                                                             1 Variation entre les mêmes mois de deux années consécutives le  réajustement  des  services  de © Agence Nationale de la Statistique et de la Démographie/DSECN /DSC/IHPC    Novembre 2010           1/7   les  prix  des 2009, les prix de la fonction ont été majorés de 1,2% Les  prix  des  services  de  «  santé »  et  des  «  restaurants  et  hôtels »  sont  demeurés stables en octobre 2010 En variation annuelle, les prix des fonctions ont respectivement crû de 0,9% et 0,6% Les fonctions « articles d'habillement et chaussures » et « biens et services divers » ont  enregistré  chacune  un  repli  de  0,2%  de  leurs  prix,  en  liaison  respectivement  avec celui des prix des « vêtements de dessus hommes » (1,8%) et des « produits pour soins corporels  »  (0,5%)  En  variation  annuelle, fonctions  ont  reculé respectivement de 0,2% et 2,5% Les  prix  des  services  de  «  transports »,  des  « boissons  alcoolisées,  tabacs  et stupéfiants  »  et  des  « meubles,  articles de ménage  et  entretien  courant du  foyer » ont  enregistré  une  baisse  de  0,3%  en  octobre  2010  Le  repli  des  prix  du  « transport aérien  de  passagers »  (1,8%)  et  des  « tabacs  et  stupéfiants »  (0,4%),  justifie respectivement  celui  des  services  de  « transports »  et  des  « boissons  alcoolisées, tabacs  et  stupéfiants  »  Lévolution  des  prix  des  «  meubles,  articles  de  ménage  et entretien  courant  du  foyer »  est  expliquée  par  la  contraction  de  ceux  des  « articles  de ménage  non  durables »  (1,1%)  En  variation  annuelle,  les  prix  des  services  de « transports »  et  des  « boissons  alcoolisées, tabacs  et  stupéfiants  »  ont  crû respectivement de 2,6% et 4,2%,  tandis que ceux des « meubles, articles de ménage et entretien courant du foyer » se sont repliés de 1,4% Au cours du mois sous revue, linflation sous jacente2 sest inscrite en hausse mensuelle de 0,7% et de 0,9% en variation annuelle Les prix des produits  locaux ont crû de 0,7%, tandis  que  ceux  des  produits  importés  se  sont  repliés  de  0,1%  Comparés  au  mois doctobre 2009,  les prix des produits  locaux et  importés ont été majorés  respectivement de 2,9% et 1,2%                                                             2 Classification permettant de suivre le niveau de linflation qui serait obtenu en dehors des phénomènes perturbateurs que sont les produits saisonniers et les produits énergétiques  © Agence Nationale de la
